Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameLogic

  • public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for handling all logic behind the game (IE. checking if a letter has been guessed, if the user solved the puzzle, etc.)
    Author:
    Kyle Dorcey

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String allGuesses
      String used to hold every guess
      private char[] correctGuessArray
      char array containing every correct guess
      private static int currentIncorrectGuessCount
      Static integer that keeps track of how many incorrect guesses a user has
      private java.lang.String incorrectGuesses
      String used to hold all incorrectGuesses
      private boolean keepPlaying
      boolean that returns true when neither userWins or userLoses is true
      private static int maxIncorrectGuessCount
      Integer which specifies the maximum amount of incorrect guesses a user can have before they lose
      private java.lang.String secretWord
      String containing the word the user will be trying to guess
      private java.lang.String secretWordToPrint
      String that will dynamically update as the user guesses elements of the secret word correctly.
      private boolean userLoses
      boolean that is true when the user loses
      private boolean userWins
      boolean that is true when the user wins

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameLogic(java.lang.String secretWord)
      Class constructor, sets the Secret word (as all uppercase letters regardless of user input), calls the static method "createDashedWord()" to set the "secretWordToPrint" variable, allGuesses, currentIncorrectGuessCount to 0, defines the correctGuessArray, sets userWins to false, userLoses to false, and keepPlaying to True.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static java.lang.String createDashedWord(java.lang.String secretWord)
      Static method which creates the version of the "SecretWord" that will be displayed.
      static int getCurrentIncorrectGuessCount() 
      java.lang.String getIncorrectGuesses() 
      boolean getKeepPlaying() 
      java.lang.String getSecretWord() 
      java.lang.String getSecretWordToPrint() 
      boolean getUserLoses() 
      boolean getUserWins() 
      private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> placeInArray(java.lang.String secretWord, java.lang.String guess)
      Returns an ArrayList of Integers to determine the indexes of the secret word that contain a specific letter (ie if the secret word is "shennanigans" the arrayList would contain (3,4,10).
      boolean repeatCheck(java.lang.String guess)
      Determines whether a user is guessing a letter they have already used
      private static java.lang.String replaceDashesWithLetter(java.lang.String secretWord, java.lang.String correctGuessWithDash, java.lang.String correctLetter)
      Static method used to dynamically update dashedSecretWord so that it replaces the "_" with a correct letter guess
      private void updateGameStatus()
      Called after the userGuess() method is called.
      boolean userGuess(java.lang.String guess)
      Checks whether a user's guess is correct or not.

    • Field Detail

      • secretWord

        private java.lang.String secretWord
        String containing the word the user will be trying to guess

      • secretWordToPrint

        private java.lang.String secretWordToPrint
        String that will dynamically update as the user guesses elements of the secret word correctly. Each time replacing a "_" with the correct guess

      • incorrectGuesses

        private java.lang.String incorrectGuesses
        String used to hold all incorrectGuesses

      • allGuesses

        private java.lang.String allGuesses
        String used to hold every guess

      • maxIncorrectGuessCount

        private static int maxIncorrectGuessCount
        Integer which specifies the maximum amount of incorrect guesses a user can have before they lose

      • currentIncorrectGuessCount

        private static int currentIncorrectGuessCount
        Static integer that keeps track of how many incorrect guesses a user has

      • correctGuessArray

        private char[] correctGuessArray
        char array containing every correct guess

      • userWins

        private boolean userWins
        boolean that is true when the user wins

      • userLoses

        private boolean userLoses
        boolean that is true when the user loses

      • keepPlaying

        private boolean keepPlaying
        boolean that returns true when neither userWins or userLoses is true

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameLogic

        public GameLogic(java.lang.String secretWord)
        Class constructor, sets the Secret word (as all uppercase letters regardless of user input), calls the static method "createDashedWord()" to set the "secretWordToPrint" variable, allGuesses, currentIncorrectGuessCount to 0, defines the correctGuessArray, sets userWins to false, userLoses to false, and keepPlaying to True.
        Parameters:
        secretWord - Word that the user will try to guess

        Returns:
        returns String incorrectGuesses

        Returns:

      • getSecretWord

        public java.lang.String getSecretWord()
        Returns:
        returns String containing the secretWord

      • userGuess

        public boolean userGuess(java.lang.String guess)
        Checks whether a user's guess is correct or not.
        Parameters:
        guess - String containing the user's guess
        Returns:
        boolean correctGuess, returns true when guess is correct

      • updateGameStatus

        private void updateGameStatus()
        Called after the userGuess() method is called. Determines whether the user has won or lost.

      • repeatCheck

        public boolean repeatCheck(java.lang.String guess)
        Determines whether a user is guessing a letter they have already used
        Parameters:
        guess - String containing the user's guess
        Returns:
        boolean that returns false if the user HAS used a letter already

      • placeInArray

        private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> placeInArray(java.lang.String secretWord,
                                                                   java.lang.String guess)
        Returns an ArrayList of Integers to determine the indexes of the secret word that contain a specific letter (ie if the secret word is "shennanigans" the arrayList would contain (3,4,10).
        Parameters:
        secretWord - String containing the secret word
        guess - String containing the user's guess
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing all index's which the user's guess appears in

      • createDashedWord

        private static java.lang.String createDashedWord(java.lang.String secretWord)
        Static method which creates the version of the "SecretWord" that will be displayed. That is for every letter in the secret word it prints "_" followed by a white-space
        Parameters:
        secretWord - String containing the secret word
        Returns:
        String containing the "_" version of the word

      • replaceDashesWithLetter

        private static java.lang.String replaceDashesWithLetter(java.lang.String secretWord,
                                                        java.lang.String correctGuessWithDash,
                                                        java.lang.String correctLetter)
        Static method used to dynamically update dashedSecretWord so that it replaces the "_" with a correct letter guess
        Parameters:
        secretWord - String containing the secret word to guess
        correctGuessWithDash - The current string containing a mixture of "_" and correct guesses
        correctLetter - The correctly guessed letter which will replace a (or multiple) "_"
        Returns:
        returns a String with updated "_" and correct letters which will be displayed to the user to show progress
